name: Janitor Office
long: A neat and tidy office, you feel a little cramped in it because it is very small. There is a desk with a chair behind it. There is a coat rack with overalls hanging on it. The desk has lots of papers in nice neat organized piles, and a big picture. There is a calendar on the wall.  The janitor is here!
short: A small, neat, and tidy office. This clearly belongs to someone who loves his family.  The janitor is here!
addl: A train whistle sounds across the lonely field

features.picture: A family picture of a woman holding two kids smiling.
features.calendar: Days that have already passed are crossed out on this calendar.
